Reviews.Title: Just as expected
Reviews.Author: Sharply7815
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop with the expectation to just do work. I have had the time of my life with the travel aspect of the "windows" file.  The touch screen works perfectly and so far, no issues. I absolutely adore my laptop especially since it arrived on time and brand new.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron touch screen lap top.
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: I am not a computer wiz...but over the evening and this morning...I have figured out most everything....I am clumsy with the touch screen...but have that down now.  It is fast....everything works...installed a trail of Microsoft Office...that all worked.....love the fact that I have been able to import photos from facebook into a photo file....for a little over 400 dollars I am very very happy.  The only drawback is that ebay was already installed as an app...and it seemed to pop up constantly.....I like e-bay but was not interested in dealing with it as I was setting up the computer.I had a MAC before...never quite got used to the lack of compatibility......this is going to be very nice and I am likely going to order one for my office computer too..since it needs to be replacedthe space  bar is noisy..not sure why that is irritating but it is...if you need a functional, uptodate lap top for a modest price this seems to do the trick

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Paola Jean-Charles
Reviews.Content: Anybody can learn how to use this product. The screen tells you and shows you everything. Good price and good buy!

Reviews.Title: fast, inexpensive
Reviews.Author: Ted
Reviews.Content: Has a slight learning curve when going to Windows 8. But the touchscreen is what it was made for.I use it for school and it does everything I need.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Raymond guerra
Reviews.Content: the laptop was pretty much new no scrathes or nothing. it works great and the touch screen is great. I am more than satisfied

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Foxyred
Reviews.Content: I've had my laptop for a few days now and I love the touch screen. It's been a little confusing trying to figure out things but I think I've getting it. Just a few more things to figure out but it's a nice laptop for a inexpensive price.

Reviews.Title: Good machine, but a bit heavy by today's standards.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My grand son loves it. It's a newer version of the same model I've been using for five years with absolutely no problems.

Reviews.Title: TOUCHSCREEN VERSATILITY!
Reviews.Author: Pam Doyle
Reviews.Content: Love the touchscreen!!!Easy to learn and navigate between the various programs.Light weight and compact for traveling and storing!

Reviews.Title: College student use.
Reviews.Author: jon sires
Reviews.Content: 2 months now still love it, no problems.would buy again.I want one for my wife with out the touch sreeen

Reviews.Title: I love this computet
Reviews.Author: terreo l hathorn
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy for the price. I purchase this computer for my kids for school projects and they are very happy. The touch screen and a great feature

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Farhan K.
Reviews.Content: i love it. this is really excellent I'll never really how to commit to my friends and friends and my family's

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: chirag patel
Reviews.Content: Its a great laptop, fast and smooth. After using a regular computer with Windows 8 I mist say Windows 8 was made.for touchscreen.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift
Reviews.Author: clothesmaven "clothesmaven"
Reviews.Content: My daughter wanted a new laptop, so I told her to do some research,,,she was apprehensive about the touch screen at first..but within minutes of receiving it, she was fantastically ELATED..she loves it,, it has " all the bells & whistles " you could ask for !,,a win - win for all

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: jany
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this to anyone especially great for kids in school. a bit slow at times but over all its a great product.

Reviews.Title: it's more than they need
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: the product is a good one. it is more than they needed for school and I use it when we are out. I have a friend looking for a computer for her son and she like it to and plans to but one as well

Reviews.Title: a little Slow
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: Well I am pretty much satisfied with this touchscreen laptop, mostly its used to surf the web, socialife, some not so demmanind games etc.. I dont need that much of computing power, but it does bother me the lag when I try to open an application it takes like 5 seconds sometimes even more, I guess processor is not that fast, I should have done my homework to find out the most decent processor speed for win 8.

Reviews.Title: I bought this to suppliment my laptop
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop as a inexpensive alternate to my HP Pavilion Dv7. I wanted to use it for Rossetta Stone training, but after using it for everyday use I am impressed with the abilities of this unit.  I actually use this laptop for everything it is my "daily driver". If you understand the windows 8.1 this is so easy to use, and the Dell support is above comparison. For four hundred dollars it does everything I need. Can't wait for my next Dell in two years :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent pc
Reviews.Author: Victoria Lemus
Reviews.Content: the laptop dell inspiration touchscreen, is an option for the daily work,easy use, perfect for an university student. really I am happy with my new pc.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase I have made on a Laptop in a LONG time.
Reviews.Author: sweetvanney
Reviews.Content: I received it in the mail yesterday after I had ordered it the week before and I love it so much. Window's 8 is simple and easy to learn, and the lightweight design is easy for transportation. I hoping to get a really cute case or sleeve for it.

Reviews.Title: its worth the money!
Reviews.Author: renzy21
Reviews.Content: This system works better than i expecteded and made a believer out of me. i am a toshiba person but was very impressed with this laptop. .you cant beat the value for money  with this purchase. i am hoping that i am afforded the same deal in two weeks as i intend to try and purchase another ..lo

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Rita H.
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these for my family. We love the product. It takes a bit of getting used to as far as using the touch screen, but overall it is a great product.

Reviews.Title: ehh
Reviews.Author: Eric Parsley
Reviews.Content: well the laptop itself is very good. The issue that I had was that having it only one week and I had to spend an additional $170 just to get it fixed because it had already crashed!

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: J. Gallagher "Teacher"
Reviews.Content: I like this computer although I thoroughly despise Windows 8. It is sturdy and a bit heavy but feels solid especially after returning an Asus to best buy that felt like a child's toy. I like the touch screen feature which I don't use much however it's nice to have when I want to scroll through something quickly. As far as the specs, I can't speak to those on technical terms but what I can say is this, it is amply "fast" for me, I like the colors which suffice just fine, and  it is quiet .The mouse pad and buttons are responsive and not overly sensitive, I like the way the key board feels, I have to press a bit harder on the keys but as a personal preference that suits me. I am satisfied with my purchase and feel that I received a good computer for the money. I have had two Toshiba Satellites before this (which I liked just fine) which cost about the same as this Dell. Of the two brands, I prefer the Dell.

Reviews.Title: Returned it.
Reviews.Author: Richard Marshall
Reviews.Content: The computer is probably OK.  Couldn't get it to work properly.  The issue was Windows 8.  Too feature rich for our purpose.  Returned this machine and bought a Windows 7 that works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: Don't get me started. I am actually suing Dell. Avoid all Dell products if you can. Their customer service is HORRID.
